mapper.select: select id, addr, age, name, password, phone, wx_openid wxOpenId, wx_nickname wxNickName, role_id roleId from user where phone = #{phone}
mapper.insert: insert into user (addr, age, name, password, phone, wx_openid, wx_nickname, role_id) values (#{addr}, #{age}, #{name}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{wxOpenId}, #{wxNickName}, #{roleId})
